author: Andrew Beaton
title: What’s a Catch? The NFL Has a New Idea
text:
Every NFL season has a crushing moment that bewilders everyone. Fans see a player catch the ball. They know it’s a catch. Then the people in charge of determining whether or not it is a catch say it wasn’t a catch. Mayhem ensues.
There have been gripes for years. Fans have felt cheated. They still feel cheated. And now the NFL has a new proposed definition for catching a football. The good news for fans: Surviving the ground, the verbiage that has been a constant scourge, is gone. The bad news: There’s new wording that’s only...
